ygData.subject: Re: Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: To answer your question, when doing the quest for someone else, I usually make them travel with me to Oggok, give them my stein, then go in and get another
ygData.messageBody:
To answer your question, when doing the quest for someone else, I usually
make them travel with me to Oggok, give them my stein, then go in and get
another one. The book is lore and no drop, the stein is lore, should be no
drop but isn't.


Telan Ka`Rlaah


At 08:25 AM 8/16/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Jason Cent <jcent@...>
>
> You still didn't answer my question, fellas....
>
> if it's LORE ITEM then what do you do with the Stein you already
>have? give it to someone to hold?
>
> Also, is the Book NO DROP or just LORE? I forget....
>
>
> I'd like to complete this quest again to sell one....I need the cash
>badly to work on my jewelry some more...I spent over 200pp last night and
>went from 43 to 48 in Jewelry. ouch!! that hurts!!
